item.title: Migrating to Hugo from Jykell
item.description: This blog was originally built on Jykell, which is pretty straight forward. Deployment to GitHub is very easy and if you add a CNAME file, you can customize the domain name as well. The other day, I was working on a project to consume video data in Kafka, the original service was written in python. Here is an example: from kafka import KafkaProducer from kafka.errors import KafkaError producer = KafkaProducer(bootstrap_servers='localhost:9092') topic = 'my-topic' video = cv2.
